data.question: What is the empirical formula for NH4NO3@1C?

Does the transition from 1C to 1O involve bond-breaking in the MOF?
What is the space group for RbNO3@1O?
What method was used for the ab-initio XRPD structural analysis of 1R?

What is the effect of M(NO3)m guest incorporation on the a parameter in the XRPD diagrams of the layered [Cu(2-pymo)2]n·(M(NO3)m)n/2 (M(NO3)m@1O)?
data.answer: The 200 reflection was used to estimate the effect, indicating changes in the a parameter.

data.question: What is the crystal size for NH4NO3@1C?
Is the process from 1C to 1O displacive?
What is the yield for the preparation of La(NO3)3@1C?
Does the transition from 1R to 1O involve a reconstructive framework reorganization?
What is the space group for NH4NO3@1C?
Can the original 1R phase be restored after guest-induced structural changes?
What is the crystal system for RbNO3@1O?
What is the effect of solvent polarity on the recognition process or structural phase transition?
data.answer: Solvent polarity has a marked effect, with metal salts of 'cubic' singly charged anions being readily recognized by 1R from water solutions, while related nitrate salts recognition processes occur only in less competitive solvents.
